entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
